snippet: Brian J. Weiss, the man who was fatally shot at a Queens hotel, was a Web marketer whose business had been the focus of thousands of consumer complaints.
abstract: Investigators are searching for answers in the fatal shooting of Brian J Weiss at a hotel near Kennedy airport in Queens; Weiss, a Web marketer whose business had been the focus of thousands of consumer complaints, was allegedly shot by Gary L Zalvesky, who then turned the gun on himself.

byline.contributor: Nate Schweber contributed reporting, and Sheelagh McNeill contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Brian J. Weiss, the man who was fatally shot at a Queens hotel, was a Web marketer whose business had been the focus of thousands of consumer complaints.

headline.seo: For Victim in Queens Hotel Shooting, Many Detractors
headline.main: Businessman Killed at Hotel Had Host of Critics
headline.print_headline: Man Killed At Hotel Had a Host Of Critics
